channel.title: EasyRSC does not allow outside connection when Portforwarded
channel.description: Well title says it, a friend can connect to a random RS2 server i put on with port 43594 but he cannot connect to my RSC easy server.

item.title: EasyRSC does not allow outside connection when Portforwarded
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

[quote=“Sumiagaming, post:3, topic:358452”][quote author=yong min link=topic=454962.msg3331486#msg3331486 date=1283522863]

You’re doing it wrong as it clearly can, there’s been hundreds of public EasyRSC servers…

[/quote]
You need to change the IP from localhost to your External IP -.-

I put the server on… and the port is forwarded. i’ve done this many times lol.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: EasyRSC does not allow outside connection when Portforwarded

item.title: EasyRSC does not allow outside connection when Portforwarded
item.dc:creator: @RSCHawk_Owner RSCHawk Owner
item.description:
@RSCHawk_Owner wrote:

Look At Server.java
and change localhost to your 192.168.0..** ip

if that doesnt work, try changing the ip in settings.ini if you already havent

Read full topic
